menna me piligath aakarayata wiruddhawa pittaniye sellan karannata aawa kandayamakuth hitiya.me aya tawume palliya aasannaye tap eka langa kiyana suprasiddha thana thibuna nagara sabha niwasa hariye padinchiwela hitapu kandayamak.(methana tap eka kiwwe para ayine thibba podu jala karamayak.paya wisihatharema wathura galagena giyapu me tap eka langa kantha parshawaya paya wisihathara purama nawa saha redi heduwa.)chandi una sahenna gahala thibba me aya langa wikat bat bola mokuthma thibune nathi nisa eewa okkomath balen wage gaththe ape krida samajayenuyi.anunge krida upakarana walin thamange wage ape pittaniye oona oona welawata awith sellan karana me ayata wiruddhawa ape game kawuruwath kisideyak kiyanna nogiye tawume chandi ekka happila anthime tawumatawath yanna nathiweyi kiyala bayatayi.eeta passe me aya eka eka tim walata chalenj karala mach gahanna ape pittaniyata ekkan enawa.ee awith mach gahanneth ape bat bola walinmayi.ee madiwata sayikal padagena pittaniya athulatama enawa.api ee dawaswala sayikal padinawa thiya pittaniye sayikalayak thallu karannawath dunne na.
